title: Are the actors on Saturday Night Live all paid about the same amount?

og.title: Are the actors on Saturday Night Live all paid about the same amount?
og.description: Answer (1 of 7): According to his book "Gasping for Airtime," former SNL cast member Jay Mohr said that his starting salary on SNL was $5,500 per week, plus $1,500 per week for a writing credit. The next year's salary was $6,500 per week (or $8000 with the writing credit) up to $12,500 per week f...
